issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description: Moving from TC to AC project.
fields.summary: Titanium.Map.Annotation.image is not working - defaults to standard pin

comments.body:
Check the kitchen sink example, https://github.com/appcelerator/KitchenSink/blob/master/Resources/examples/map_view2.js

it works.

Titanium.Map.Annotation.image must point to a valid image resource.

h6.Tested on - iOS Simulator
{code}
